Obito slams his right hand to the ground, creating a summoning symbol to call [[Ten-Tails]]. The Ten-Tails' fist will then burst from under the ground a short distance in front of Obito, striking the opponent. As the rest of the incomplete Ten-Tails surfaces, Obito stands upon its head, ordering it to attack. An eruption will occur in front of the Ten-Tails, incinerating Obito's opponent.
